amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 116-2 to increase the funding for the Northern Marianas Medicaid program by $16 million to help the islands in recovery from Typhoon Mangkhut and Super Typhoon Yutu.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sablan amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Sablan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sablan amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
